channel.title: Kay i kinda need help with a few things
channel.description:
Kay i want to make my server like the best but i need a lil help with
1.Barrows I wanna make barrows like 80% I mean like 3 brothers drop 3 different keys then u use those 3 keys on the chest to get 1 barrows item But i dont want the keys easy to get i want it to be rare.. I also dont know how to add drops or npc's so will some1 help me?
2.I want to add food timers and mage timers but i just dont know how..
3.How do i change 1 place of wild to nonwild like ice plateau its wild but i dont want it to be how do i change it?
4.Also how do i make some npc's say stuff cuzz some of the stuff on the client is rather gay. and i dont like it i want to change it but i dont know how someone plx help me

item.title: Kay i kinda need help with a few things
item.dc:creator: @b_b0yz_4 b b0yz 4
item.description:
@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

he gave u the files smarts to search them in. You just search for what you want in those files using CTRL+F

item.title: Kay i kinda need help with a few things
item.dc:creator: @moparwha moparwha
item.description:
@moparwha wrote:

Npcdrops.cfg

SEARCH BUTTON FTL -.-

ctrl+f

inwild/wild something like that. go to top left corner to bottom right corner

Npchandler.java or client.java

Read full topic
